s: I ordered this clock and LOVED the first one, so ordered a second. The second one's light dimmed to where it is unreadable after a few weeks. Yes, yes, I've changed the battery... it just doesn't work. Unfortunately I waited until after the return window closed so I guess I'll just toss it. VERY disappointed - I thought Bulova was a reliable brand...

s: We like having clocks available wherever we are in our home, that includes the bathroom. The clock we've had in our bathroom had been there for a number of years.
